original_title: Sex & the City: The Original XXX Parody
overview: Mr. Big has been offered a job in L.A. and wants Carrie to move there with him. Carrie`s girlfriends are shocked to hear Carrie is leaving them. Meanwhile Charlotte`s boyfriend Harry wants to get to know her butt a bit better; Miranda and Steve seek out a woman for a threesome on Craigslist and Samantha dumps her actor boyfriend for a new boy toy from next door.
title: Sex & the City: The Original XXX Parody
